ygData.subject: Re: Disenchantment.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... All the mage classes have a line of spells starting with Shieldskin (wizards get it at 16th). It costs a spell component. Unfortunately, it is for the self
ygData.messageBody:
>I wish the spellshield effect of guardian rhythms were really
>there. I got to watch with a bit of jealousy last night as
>someone fought a monster and I kept seeing "A [monster] hits
>[person] but a magical skin(?) absorbs the blow."
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...
>

All the mage classes have a line of spells starting with Shieldskin (wizards
get it at 16th). It costs a spell component. Unfortunately, it is for the
self only and will absorb up to a certain amount of damage. Later on they
get Leatherskin, and later an even better one.
Now the cool thing about Enchanters is they have a similar spell that they
CAN cast on others, and it is very effective. It also gives the same message
that your magical skin absorbs the blow.

Sartori D'Elsiraad
Bard of Kelethin of the 11th Chorus
Veeshan
